alert.note: Alert for Clark; Dallas; Ouachita (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 10 at 7:56AM CDT until June 10 at 11:00AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 815 AM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN CLARK...SOUTHWESTERN DALLAS AND NORTHWESTERN OUACHITA COUNTIES... At 756 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles south of Sparkman, or 16 miles north of Camden, moving southeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Sparkman... Chidester... Whelen Springs... Poison Springs State Park... White Oak Lake State Park... Princeton... Manning... Ouachita... Reader... Vaden... Tates Bluff... Pine Grove... Dalark... Bragg City... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
